participant_1.background:
One of my favorite things is to spend time with the people I love.
my girl friend lives in the condo next door.
I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
i sit on my computer for several hours a day.
I started a bakery to help me cope with my mental health.

participant_2.background:
I'm a stay at home mom who is looking for a new home for my family.
i m a breath of fresh air.
i am a breath of fresh air.
i tend to argue with myself more than i argue with myself.
I'll always cherish the time I spent playing with my siblings and cousins in the backyard.

content.text: What's up?
I'm good, looking to find a new home with my family.
Oh that's exciting! What kind of home are you looking for?
We're looking for a place with lots of space, and a backyard for the kids to play in.
That sounds like a great place to raise a family. I grew up in a house like that, and I have some great memories of playing in the backyard with my siblings and cousins.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good childhood. I hope my kids have the same kind of experience.
I'm sure they will. What are your kids' names?
We have a son named Jack, and a daughter named Jill.
Those are great names!
Thanks! I like them too.
So what do you do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family, go for walks, and read.
That sounds like a great way to relax.
It is! I also like to bake.
Oh really? That's awesome! I love to bake too.
I'm glad to hear that! What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love to make cookies.
Cookies are the best! I love chocolate chip cookies.
Me too! But I also like to make funfetti cookies.
Funfetti cookies are delicious!
I know right
